programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Anjali is upset and deeply hurt to see Taarak eating a heavy breakfast with the Gadas. Champaklal supports Taarak until Anjali tells him about what Taarak did with her home-made meals.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: While Anjali goes out of town for a day, Jethalal plans an elaborate feast for Taarak. In order to avoid eating diet food cooked by Daya, Taarak fakes being ill. Anjali finds out and gets tensed.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Since Taarak cannot go out, Jethalal asks Natu Kaka and Bagha to bring food to Gokuldham. The duo land in trouble when the huge carton they're using to hide the food is seen by Goli.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Pandemonium breaks out when Sodhi informs everyone that Anjali has returned home. While all the men hide in the kitchen with the food, Taarak tries to distract Anjali from the food aroma.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Realising that the men are lying, all the women are furious and decide to teach them a lesson. Daya insists on using a special trick to get rid of the rat in Taarak's kitchen.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When an upset Anjali tries to walk away, Taarak tries to woo her with a nice song and also promises to obey her.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The men discuss friendships on social media. Later, the ladies of Gokuldham are elated due to the cozy climate caused by the rain.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Champaklal walks in to see the women dancing in the rain. A surprise awaits Jethalal as he reaches the shop and gets out of the raincoat that Daya made him wear in the morning.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal ensures that Iyer and Babita don't see him returning home splattered in mud. Later, Iyer wants to shoot a video of Jethalal in dirty clothes.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Taarak comes home late from work, Anjali gets worried. Later, she finds Taarak's behaviour quite strange.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Anjali suspects that Taarak is hiding something in his laptop when he behaves in a secretive manner. Later, her suspection causes worry.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya enters just as Anjali mulls over her next move. Later, she's shocked when Anjali reveals the reason for her worry.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Anjali overhears a conversation between Daya and Jethalal, it upsets her deeply. Later, she decides to leave her house.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Anjali hides in Jethalal and Daya's home. Later, Jethalal follows Taarak and is shocked to see him with a woman.

programme.title: CID
programme.desc: A gruesome murder in a crowded picnic spot has the Team CID investigating a bizarre case. Meanwhile, the team is led to believe that a trained falcon may have killed the man.

programme.title: CID
programme.desc: A girl talking on the phone near a construction site gets stabbed by someone. Later, when the CID team arrives for investigation they find a dead rickshaw driver along with the girl's dead body.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Champaklal loses his temper when he finds out his rail tickets can only be used on the same day. Meanwhile, Anjali and Taarak talk about their happy and peaceful life in Gokuldham.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal sings a romantic song for his wife Daya, as Babita enters their house. Babita invites Daya to her house for a meet.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: A gemstone helps Ratnavali uncover Popatlal's marital status. Babita takes the initiative to introduce Ratnavali to others.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal tells his friends about the secret meeting their wives are having. Daya and her friends ask their husbands to wear gemstones, but they don't know that their loyalty is being put to the test.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The residents of a housing society help each other find solutions when they face common real-life challenges and get involved in sticky situations.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The wives at Gokuldham make their husbands wear the lockets which, according to Ratnavali, will disclose their innermost feelings.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal gets happy on seeing Babita early in the morning and reprimands her for going shopping alone. He offers to help her but Babita tells him to finish his errand before Ratnavali comes.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: A lady gives all the men of Gokuldham a locket and tells them its colour will change when they partake in any suspicious activity.

programme.title: The Kapil Sharma Show
programme.desc: Himesh Reshammiya and Iulia Vantur join the show to celebrate their new album.

programme.title: The Kapil Sharma Show
programme.desc: Legendary musicians Kumar Sanu, Udit Narayan and Anuradha Paudwal are invited by Kapil Sharma for hilarious interactions and to discuss their renowned performances.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Champaklal finds himself in trouble as a bookie dupes him at the casino, and he struggles to cope with the situation.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Champaklal is in shock when he finds Jethalal and the others at the casino. Champaklal learns about Jethalal's true intentions.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The police apprehend the extortionists and promise to trace the number from which Jethalal was called. Champaklal apologises to Jethalal for not trusting him.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Surbhi tells her husband that she and her son will go with him on one condition: he must leave his parents to be with his wife and son. Her in-laws are shocked when their son agrees.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Surbhi's husband and in-laws realise their mistake and apologise to Surbhi and the others. Surbhi and Khushi reunite with their family.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: After Khushi leaves, Daya deeply misses her presence in the house. Jethalal tries to console and comfort her.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The ladies of Gokuldham society decide to visit Khushi and take along some of her belongings that were left behind.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal has to leave town on short notice to attend a seminar in Thiruvananthapuram, but he is irked by Daya's choice of clothing while packing his bag. Sodhi agrees to take him to the airport.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal leaves for the seminar. Daya is surprised when she gets a call from the actress Deepika Padukone.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Deepika praises the members of Gokuldham for saving a girl child and setting an example. She gets to meet Khushi and Surbhi and spends time with everyone. Abdul has shocking news for Bhide.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: During his morning round of delivering milk, Abdul meets Babita, Anjali, and Chandu. Later, he occupies himself with writing bills as the price of milk has gone up.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Abdul's customers are suspecting him of overcharging for the milk, but he denies it. Roshan's wife thinks they should look for a new supplier.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal's son tries to get money from him by complimenting his chocolate milk. Champaklal and Jethalal give Tapu a lecture on money management. Abdul brings them their bills.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: A grumpy Taarak informs Bhide and Sodhi that because of the rise in milk prices Anjali served him black tea. Bhide meets a new milkman, Santosh.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Madhavi informs Bhide that the women approve of Santosh, the new milkman. The men decide to buy milk from Santosh for a few days.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham enjoy the milk provided by Santosh and inform Abdul about it. They are taken aback by Abdul's response.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Abdul overhears Bhide, Sodhi, and Popatal talking ill about him. Tapu gives Abdul some advice and he formulates a plan.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham are extremely disturbed to learn that their milk was stolen. After discussing it among themselves, they call Abdul for a meeting.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham society are left startled when they find out that Iyer is the one who was stealing the milk from everyone's house.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Abdul informs the residents of Gokuldham that after visiting the headquarters of the milk company, he gave some packets of milk delivered by Santosh to Iyer for testing.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham have Santosh and his men arrested. Iyer teaches everyone how to distinguish between real and synthetic milk.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal invites Taarak to his house for a fancy lunch after learning that he has been eating the same food everyday.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal decides to prepare a good meal for his family and Taarak with everything he can find in the kitchen, but he eventually learn that he has messed up with the ingredients.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Iyer's boss wants to eat Gujarati food, he has to quickly find someone who specialises in cooking it.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Iyer and Babita ask for Jethalal's help. For Babita's sake, Jethalal agrees to cook Gujarati food for Iyer's boss but struggles to learn how.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal is anxious about cooking Gujarati food for Iyer's boss. Babita and Iyer call Jethalal to cook dinner as promised, but he is missing.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal and Taarak have no idea about how to cook Gujarati food. On seeing Jethalal upset, Bagha gives him some advice.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal starts preparing the food for Iyer's boss with Nattu Kaka and Bagha's help, but his day is complicated by sudden visitors.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal goes to Iyer's house with Daal Dhokli. After learning about the dish for dinner, his boss requests more food.
